name: Srikar Kodi
title: Working Student – Software Engineer / AI
summary: Passionate Python Developer and MSc Computer Science (Big Data & AI) student with experience in full-stack development, data engineering, and AI agents. Skilled in building end-to-end applications, ETL pipelines, and automation tools, and actively seeking working student roles in software and AI.

bullets: Played a key role in developing templeswiki.com as a Full Stack Developer, building and optimizing multiple pages and microservices to ensure a responsive and user-friendly experience.
Developed an interactive chatbot integrated with Natural Language Processing (NLP) to enhance user engagement and streamline customer interactions within the application.
Built a robust ETL pipeline using Python to generate multi-language labels, facilitating seamless content translation across languages.

Led the QA team by crafting a comprehensive test plan to rigorously test and ensure smooth application operation, and developed an in-house attendance recording tool to improve organizational efficiency.
Contributed to enhancing software modules by addressing bugs and optimizing performance, working closely with various teams to improve application quality.
Conducted thorough manual testing to identify and report bugs, ensuring comprehensive coverage of application functionalities.
Transitioned to the QA team to focus on product testing, executing test cases to validate functionality and identify areas for improvement.
Developed and executed detailed test plans and test cases for manual testing, improving the accuracy and reliability of test results.

projects.name: Werkstudent Job Agent
bullets: Built an automated system to scrape StepStone and LinkedIn for IT working student roles in Berlin using Selenium.
Implemented Excel-based job tracking with de-duplication and date tracking, and integrated a local LLM via Ollama to generate tailored resumes and cover letters for each job.

projects.name: DataSet Translator App
bullets: Developed a Python-based GUI application that lets users upload CSV or Excel datasets and translate content into a selected target language.
Used the googletrans library for text translation and openpyxl for efficient Excel file handling, enabling multi-language data exports for non-technical users.

projects.name: Data Engineering Project
bullets: Implemented robust data cleaning and transformation pipelines in Pandas to align raw CSV data with a defined data model.
Created and managed PostgreSQL tables using psycopg2 and automated insertion of cleaned data into the database to support analytics workloads.

projects.name: TemplesWiki Web Platform
bullets: Contributed to the development of templeswiki.com by building and optimizing multiple pages and microservices for a responsive and scalable web platform.
Collaborated with designers and backend engineers to improve page performance and maintain a clean, modular codebase.

projects.name: NLP Chatbot for Customer Engagement
bullets: Developed an interactive chatbot integrated with Natural Language Processing to improve user engagement and automate answers to common queries.
Integrated the chatbot into a production web application, helping reduce manual support workload and improving response times.

projects.name: Multi-language Label ETL Pipeline
bullets: Built an ETL pipeline in Python to generate multi-language labels from source data for use in web applications.
Automated data extraction, transformation, and loading to support seamless content translation across languages.

education.degree: MSc in Computer Science – Big Data and Artificial Intelligence
